page.title: 05Rural-Ormskirk Amenities
page.content: This block on the outskirts of Ormskirk is probably typical of a rural area in that it has few of the amenities expected by most people today. In our survey we found 2 'phone boxes and 3 post boxes. There is no post office. Although children living 3 miles from school catch a school 'bus, There is very little public transport. We saw only 2 'bus stops. As there is no shop people either come into the town or rely on an occasional mobile shop or on having their goods delivered from the few shops still providing this service. Most people grow their own vegetables and we found that 4 farm shops sell their produce.
